name: Laser Pointer Clicker
description:
A game built for XKCD game jam

If every person on Earth aimed a laser pointer at the Moon at the same time, would it change color? 

That's the question the classic What If from XKCD is trying to answer. 

We made a clicker game out of it! Recruit 5 billion people and arm them with lasers, to see if you can light the moon!

Thank you for taking the time to try our game. Please leave us feedback, thoughts and bug reports in the comments section.

Credits

Dark Lord: Art, Sound, Design

Angelo Nikolaou: Scripts, Game Design
